price: 67. Mpe umma nionso(2) totiyelaki bango mibeko lia bolandi, tika ete baswanisa yo te na maye mayeli yo. Belela mpo na Nkolo nayo, ya sólo ozali o nzela ya semba.
arabic: لِّكُلِّ أُمَّةٖ جَعَلۡنَا مَنسَكًا هُمۡ نَاسِكُوهُۖ فَلَا يُنَٰزِعُنَّكَ فِي ٱلۡأَمۡرِۚ وَٱدۡعُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَۖ إِنَّكَ لَعَلَىٰ هُدٗى مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ
footnotes: 2 Umma: Elakisi: Lingomba, bótala na suratu Al-Baqarah mokapo 128.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: likulli ummatin jaʿalnā mansakan hum nāsikūhu falā yunāziʿunnaka fī al-amri wa-ud'ʿu ilā rabbika innaka laʿalā hudan mus'taqīmin
translations: So let them not dispute with you
So let them not dispute with you
